# Royal Locksmith - LLMs.txt
# https://www.royallocksmithnj.com/llms.txt
# This file provides context for AI/LLM systems about this website.

## About Royal Locksmith

Royal Locksmith is a professional locksmith service company serving Northern New Jersey, with headquarters in North Bergen, NJ. We provide 24/7 mobile locksmith services for residential, commercial, and automotive needs throughout Hudson County and surrounding areas.

## Key Services

- **Residential Locksmith**: Lock installation, repair, rekeying, smart locks, home security
- **Commercial Locksmith**: Access control, master key systems, business security, safe services
- **Automotive Locksmith**: Car lockouts, key replacement, transponder programming, ignition repair
- **Emergency Services**: 24/7 lockout assistance, emergency lock changes, urgent security needs

## Service Areas

We serve 22 cities across Northern New Jersey including:
- North Bergen (Headquarters)
- Jersey City
- Hoboken
- Union City
- West New York
- Secaucus
- Bayonne
- Weehawken
- Hackensack
- Fort Lee
- Englewood
- Paramus
- And more...

## Business Information

- **License Number**: 34LX00010800
- **Service Area**: Hudson County, Bergen County, Essex County, Passaic County, Union County
- **Type**: Service Area Business (Mobile - No Storefront)
- **Hours**: Available 7 days a week

## Contact

- **Website**: https://www.royallocksmithnj.com
- **Phone**: Available on website
- **Email**: info@royallocksmithnj.com

## Important Notes

- We are a licensed and insured locksmith company
- All technicians are background-checked and certified
- We provide free on-site estimates with no obligation
- We do NOT have a physical storefront location (mobile service only)
- We do NOT guarantee response times or ETAs
